Class GLModelCaptureRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.model.opengl.GLModelCaptureRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GLOffscreenCaptureRequest
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VehicleModelCaptureRequest

    public class GLModelCaptureRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements GLOffscreenCaptureRequest
    Render a 3D model to a bitmap

      • setOutputSize

        public void setOutputSize(int size,
                          boolean crop)
        Set the desired output size of the capture
        Parameters:

        crop - True to automatically crop the image to the model bounds

      • setStrokeColorContrast

        public void setStrokeColorContrast(boolean contrastColor)
        Set whether the stroke color is automatically calculated based on the overall color of the model, where a darker model will produce a white stroke, and a lighter model will produce a black stroke
        Parameters:
        contrastColor - True to use contrast color for the stroke
